features: Vegetable-based bar soap cleans and freshens your hands and body
A moisturizing bar soap milled three times to make its lather rich and creamy - perfect for hands, body, and bath
Rain Water scented bar soap has a fragrance so clean. Drops of Rain Water fall on leaves and noses and fill the air
Thoughtfully chosen ingredients with no formaldehyde, phthalates, or artificial colors
Mrs. Meyer's produces cruelty free soap bars. None of our products are tested on animals
Can be used as bath soap, body soap and more
body.description: Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day bar soap can be used for hands, body, and bath. Made with vegetable base with olive oil, this solid soap is milled three times to make its lather rich and creamy. Drops of Rain Water fall on leaves and noses and fill the air. Our Rain Water scented bar soap has a scent so clean, hinting of white flowers. Splash in a puddle! This rich and creamy bar soap contains a special formula of almond oil, coconut oil, essential oils, and other thoughtfully chosen ingredients that leaves skin feeling clean and fresh. Leave a bar of soap in your bathtub, shower, and sink for head to toe clean. The soap bar wrapper is made with 100% post-consumer paper. Made without formaldehyde, phthalates, or artificial colors - and of course, always a cruelty free soap bar. Also available in other garden inspired scents and products such as body lotions, laundry detergents, candles, and so much more! Mrs. Meyer's - rooted in goodness.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Making The World a More Greener Place One Garden At A Time Mrs. Meyer’s Clean Day products are inspired by the garden, which is why we’re inspired to plant flowers, plants and trees. At Mrs. Meyer’s, we have a passion for the environment. We also know the importance of being a good neighbor in our home, our community and our world. That’s why we’ve made a commitment to improving the earth one flower, plant and tree at a time through our campaigns, partnerships, volunteering efforts and donations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No plastic bottles!
reviews.reviewText: I wash my hands often and prefer bar soap in my bathroom. I love the silky feel and nice scent of this soap. It foams up well and my hands feel clean afterwards. I especially like how long it lasts and no plastic bottle added to the environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I would rate this 10 if I could.
reviews.reviewText: It's absolutely the perfect bar of soap. Smells like rain and very moisturizing. Leaves skin amazing. I can't say enough. My favorite soap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just a great bar soap
reviews.reviewText: This is a good size bar of soap. It lathers well throughout the entire bar. If it has a scent it is a fresh, clean smelling scent. Leaves your skin feeling happy and refreshed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great suds and doesn’t dry my skin out Very nice scent but could be stronger

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells SO good
reviews.reviewText: Based on the scent alone, this bar soap is one of the best. I was in search of a Harry’s brand bar soap, but like the cleaning sprays of the Meyer’s brand so I figured it try it out. It last good amount of time considering I used it every day. As a woman, I really enjoy subtle cologne scents that smell masculine yet clean and refreshing. This is the one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes good suds
reviews.reviewText: Bought it for it's good size, liked the way it is sudsy and this one doesn't have a strong aroma.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Hard Hand Soap
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for the kitchen this soap lathers quickly, cleans dirty hands effectively and most importantly won't dry them out when you wash them again and again.The photo shows the size and condition of the bar after more than three months of daily use with artificially softened water. I'm chef, housekeeper and repair tech for everything in the home and make significant use of the soap carefully selected for this location. I even made rather extraordinary use of the bar for a few days while working with graphite--extraordinarily sticky stuff that does not remove easily. It's excellent hard, long-lasting nearly ideal "hand soap."This is my first experience with this brand of a stash of a brand no longer made ran dry. While it does not feel as hard and dense as the previous which could last for months it is certainly was I consider to be a "hard" bar of soap that can be expected not to turn into mush in the soap dish and last for a good period of time.I chose "rainwater" or similar scent as I wanted something fairly neutral. That's what I got.I have been using this nearly arrived bar very frequently as I'm working with things that dirty my hands quickly with difficult to remove things like graphite and polish residue yet I nonetheless must keep things scrupulously clean requiring very frequent handwashing.Again, this is an excellent hand soap perfect for the kitchen sink. I wouldn't expect it to work for auto mechanic work dirty hands and have other things around for that--at least the first washing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Forget a separate shampoo.
reviews.reviewText: I'm trying to simply the products I use and I feel like I've done it with this soap. An all in one, and it smells great. Not harsh on my skin or hair and good enough for my face. A win, win.
